TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void TargetFinishedEventHandler(object sender, TargetFinishedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed TargetFinishedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.TargetFinishedEventArgs"> that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventSource.TargetFinished"> event of a build.
